name: Fr. Eric Anthony S. Escandor, SJ
position: Chaplain, Ateneo de Davao University - Senior High School
bionote: Fr. Eric Anthony S. Escandor, SJ is the newest member of the Davao Jesuit Community. Fr. Eric earned his AB in International Studies from Xavier University-Ateneo de Cagayan in 2003, his bachelor’s degree in Sacred Theology from the Loyola School of Theology in 2014, and a Master’s in Pastoral Ministry from Ateneo de Manila University in 2016. He joined the Society of Jesus in 2003, ordained a priest in 2014, and recently completed his Tertianship in Australia. Fr. Eric has held various roles within the Jesuit community, including teaching at Ateneo de Davao Junior High School and serving as a Campus Minister, Chaplain at Xavier University Junior High and Grade School, and Director of the Philippine Jesuit Province Vocations and Candidacy House. As Vice President of the Ateneo Diplomatic Corps of Xavier University, he was one of the organizers of the first ever Mindanao International Studies Society Convention (MISSCON) in 2003.
